title: Wolfe and Montcalm
creator_credit: Allan Wargon, Julian Biggs and ONF | NFB
brief_description: The film recreates the tense hours before the Battle of the Plains of Abraham (1759, Quebec), and then the battle itself in which both Generals Wolfe and Montcalm were fatally wounded.
